
{{alias}}( str )
    Returns the Unicode aware length of a `string`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Unicode aware length.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'beep' )
    4
    > out = {{alias}}( 'bella ciao ğŸŒ·' )
    12

    See Also
    --------
